pullRequest.title: Add HTTP authentication and authorization to REST server (#454)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added jersey functionality for authentication and authorization to server
Added LoginServiceFactory for different ways to access user data (e.g. HashLoginService, custom LDAP login service (not yet implemented))
Added RepositoryFilter for repository authorization that is dynamically binded to repository accessing classes and methods
Added a resource for tests:

This resource will probably get deleted after we secured the real resources and authentication and authorization will be tested there!


Added persistant default storage of users with HashLoginService using a java property file

The AuthTestResource will be removed once we have the actual resources where we test authentication then.
Closes: #454
